name: Brains strong together
description:
So this is my second completed game jam.

Ambitions - were high

Corners - were cut

Game - somehow done

Hotel - trivago

In this game you are the patient zero in zombie apocalipse, your goal is to zombificate all humans in your town. That's all have fun!

ps: Don't know why but html is not working

ps2: I have got it working but UI is wrong, not game breaking so I elected to ignore it.

ps3: There is a number of zombies needed to zombifie human above their head.

ps4: My game title realy likes unnecessary letters in it.

ps5: Out of stock.
